name: The Warped Caster
description:
The Warped Caster is a little arcade game. You are a mage and you protect 3 lines attacked by monsters. You have 3 spell (Fire, Ice, Thunder), shoot with their weakness !

NOTE: The tileset and the soundtrack came from the game The Messenger by Sabotage Studio.

I do not own nor claim to own the assets from The Messenger or any copyrighted material here, and will take this game down if any of the copyright owners request that I do so.
If you're interested by 
The Messenger: https://themessengergame.com/
